MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I know. It's a shame, but as long as I'm tightly restrained and can't do anything, and as long as there is a possibility that the children will be targeted by thug's gun, I shouldn't be careless.

The tyrant controls me with his left hand, while firing the gun he is holding in his right hand wildly at the ceiling. The children panic and cry out, probably frightened by the sound of the gunshots and the shouting of the thug.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Shut up! Don't make a sound! I'll kill you!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Kyaaaahhhh, Conductor!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah. Everyone, Conductor - I'm sorry. This was supposed to be a fun day. I know you're scared, and I know you hate it, and I didn't want you to feel that way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...This person seems to want me, so if you don't do anything, they'll let you off. I want you to close your eyes, cover your ears, and don't move. And Conductor, don't think anything silly.
When Puerto Rico starts to cry, I tell her not to be too hard on herself and hand her a bundle of letters. The reason I came to the Underwater Temple this time was to deliver these.
Apparently so. It was those guards who arrested the unconscious thug. However, since the criminal was also a professional, they could not prevent his actions.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
I'll see you again, right?
"We'll be friends forever."
Recap of Episode 2. Just when I thought Puerto Rico was doing something silly again... a mysterious thug rushes in and starts behaving atrociously.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, I was certainly able to be everyone's friend for a very short time.
It was a great way to spend our youth together.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I told you to shut up! That's why I hate kids!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, everyone... "Thank you for saving my life," "I'm sorry I scared you," "I'm surprised you're so strong, Puerto Rico."
There is a strange sound like something snapping.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It seems that Aca regretted that she spoke too strongly,
and wanted to apologize and let me do what I wanted.

Yeah, I can't blame her for causing that incident,
but I heard that Puerto Rico voluntarily withdrew from the school in question.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: These are...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I love you...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Because of me...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Because I didn't understand it and acted selfishly, I caused horrible things to happen to innocent children... I had to say goodbye to everyone who had accepted me as a friend, only to leave them with nothing but bad memories.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: She didn't have to. I'm a fool who deserves to be scolded. I'm a high-up politician in a position where I can't just go to school and enjoy my youth.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't say anything else, just come with me!
After tightly restraining me with handcuffs, the assailant moves roughly, grabs Puerto Rico's long, beautiful hair, and tries to drag her somewhere forcibly.

Puerto Rico rubs her eyes gingerly and opens a letter she received
with great care and reads it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Aca knew that I wanted to go to school. So she let me do what I wanted... She also took care of all the political duties during that time for me.

After the incident... When I go to the Underwater Temple to inform them of the results of the investigation, which I was able to find out because I was involved in the case, Puerto Rico, who had already returned to her normal state, greets me with her typical innocent smile.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm really...I'm an unbelievable idiot.
As I think that, I writhe desperately on the floor, trying to deflect the gun's aim, even if I have to take a bullet― and in that moment...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I love you all very much, too.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I will make Flamarine a land of peace and happiness so that when you grow up, we can meet again with a smile. I'll make Flamarine a peaceful and happy place so we can laugh about that time.
Puerto Rico looks at the irritated-looking thug with a gaping mouth. Then she forces an awkward smile and starts to say something stupid, like she always does.

They're letters from the kids in your class at the school.
They were all very sad because their favorite classmate suddenly left them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, I get it! It's an evacuation drill.
We did one at the Underwater Temple♪

It's not a situation that can be laughed off, as you might expect, with a gun pointed at you by an assailant who doesn't seem to be interested in talking anymore. Puerto Rico is disappointed and stands up from her seat. Then, glaring at the surroundings in a surprisingly beautiful way, she speaks.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: W-what did you say...?

On the contrary, the thug looks uncomfortable― and points the muzzle at the children. It's the worst possible turn of events. The school that had been so peaceful just a moment ago is becoming the scene of a gruesome tragedy that will go down in history!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wow, that's some serious acting♪ You really look like a terrorist or something! It's good that you're serious about your acting, but scaring the children...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: At least I will create a wonderful country where no one will never have to cry again. It's difficult, and I'm an idiot who can't do anything, but I promise.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...I told you to shut up, didn't I, kids?

No! You can't take Puerto Rico with you! She's our friend!―
It's a heartbreaking cry, but the thug doesn't care.

She doesn't take any child's opinion for a fool,
because this is how she holds them, dearly and carefully.
As long as there is such a woman who is as foolish as a child, as pure and as good as a child, I feel that Flamarine will one day become a country where everyone can truly live happily.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Puerto Rico, Your Majesty...
Just be quiet and come with me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh? What? I don't mind, but why?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You don't need to know. You wouldn't understand my motives if I explained them to you anyway, you stupid princess who is a disgrace to Flamarine.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
How cruel. Even if you think something like that,
you shouldn't say it out loud. It's rude to talk badly, and girls won't like it.
So says the world-famous Stupid Princess of Flamarine, Puerto Rico, a politician who is constantly failing, and hugs the bundle of letters like a precious treasure.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Haha, Aca looked at me like she hated me,
but she made sure the school had a guard or something.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'm sorry...I didn't mean to scare you.
Wiping away the blood that stains her face and the tears that have begun to flow with the back of her hand, Puerto Rico stands there as if at a loss.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, my gun...
When I look, I see that the gun the thug was waving around like a big man is bent in half. He can't fire a bullet with that thing― but how? What the hell just happened?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Doing that to children...
It was Puerto Rico. She had done something to it. She had always laughed gently and innocently, but now she has erased all emotion from her beautiful face and is looking at the thug up close.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pointing a gun, a weapon...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Thug
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You bitch, what the hell...!?

The assailant panics, braces himself, and raises his bent gun high in the air.
He may try to silence the erratic Puerto Rico by hitting her with it, but...

Puerto Rico doesn't shut up.
On the contrary, she screams so loudly that it shakes the earth!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You're a lot more stupid than I am!!!
Puerto Rico releases her rage. Then, with a speed that is unbelievable from his usual calm appearance, she grabs the face of the thug and slams it against a nearby blackboard!
The blackboard is cracked in the shape of a spider web, and the limbs of the violent man spasm. Fresh blood gushes out from the thug's head, scattering with dust like Phantom Mist.
The thug fainting or dead, Puerto Rico takes her hand away from his limp body and comes to her senses with a huff. Then she looks back at the classroom― at the children who are stunned and crying.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah...umm, well...

After all that happened, the assailant is arrested and thoroughly interrogated, revealing his motive for the crime. It seems that someone who was annoyed with the politician sisters, who are becoming more and more powerful, had hired a professional assassin and sent him to kill them.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Thanks, guys. I'm sorry... I can only say things like that to anyone right now― I'm so sorry I was such an idiot.
Seeing Puerto Rico complaining like that with tears in her eyes, whether it's painful or scary―instinctively, wanting to help her, the children by her side reach out one after another and shout.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Puerto Rico
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Heehhh? I don't want you to be rough with me!
I will obey you, and I won't complain!
